InterfaceList.InterfaceId: InterfaceList is optional if ConnectionInfo is provided;; interface_id
InterfaceList.InterfaceName: InterfaceList is optional if ConnectionInfo is provided;; xe-0/0/0

MetaData.InstanceId: NetworkDevice that references a VNF must provide an InstanceId;;For connectivity collection will be colocated on its server;;ChassisType must be virtual
MetaData.ServerId: NetworkDevice that references a CloudInstance must provide a ServerId;;ChassisType must be virtual

JtiConfig.Username: JTI device username for pyez netconf ssh config
JtiConfig.Password: JTI device password for pyez netconf ssh config

SensorList.Name: sensor_name used for pyez netconf ssh config
SensorList.Resource: sensor_resource_path used for pyez netconf ssh config;;Supported Sensors;;/junos/system/linecard/interface/,/junos/system/linecard/cpu/memory/,/junos/system/linecard/npu/memory/,/junos/system/linecard/npu/utilization/,/junos/system/linecard/packet/usage/,/junos/system/linecard/firewall/

SnmpConfig.Community: check device snmp config;; needed when version=2c
SnmpConfig.Username: check device snmp config;; needed when version=3
SnmpConfig.Password: check device snmp config;; authentication passphrase, needed when version=3
SnmpConfig.Level: check device snmp config;; security level, needed when version=3
SnmpConfig.Protocol: check device snmp config;; MD5|SHA needed when version=3
SnmpConfig.PrivProtocol: check device snmp config;; DES|AES for version=3
SnmpConfig.PrivKey: check device snmp config;; privacy protocol pass phrase, for version=3
OIDList: OIDs and Top-level MIBs for which plugins are specified for collection;;Supported OIDs;;TCP-MIB::tcp,IF-MIB::ifXTable,IF-MIB::ifTable,APPFORMIX_ROUTING_ENGINE_MIB,1.3.6.1.4.1.2636.3.4.2,enterprises.2636.3.1.13.1
